title: Client bugging up (Never experienced this before)
body:
I was in a ranked 5v5 solo/duo game just before then randomly got disconnected out of no where. After it not connecting for a short  period of time I decided to restart my league thinking that's what the problem was. After returning to the game It did not offer for me to join back to the game and straight away let me create a new game. It didn't even show anything in my match history or take away any of my LP.. 

What the heck just happen....

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like the match itself crashed, has the match appeared in your match history at all yet? If not then there's no issue, the game never existed.
No theres still nothing appearing in my match history about that game and it has now been 2 days. Weirdest thing I've seen.
